review_data.title: The best lamb jalfrezi in Zurich!
review_data.content: We went for an evening meal to an old favourite, Swaad. I fancied a change from my regular Chicken Tikka Masla and asked if they knew how to make a Jalfrezi. They said they made it all the time but had limited room on the...More

review_data.title: Food like in India
review_data.content: Food actually tastes like in India. Ever Sinne we were living im India, we do not go anywhere else for Indian food. You Will Not find a Place that is more authentic than this one.

review_data.title: Heute Abend: "Home Delivery. Sehr gutes Essen, fein, schön präsentiert und ausreichend grosse Portionen.
review_data.content: Wir bestellten heute für unser Nachtessen über das Take-Away/Home-Delivery Menü sehr feine indische Speisen für uns. Suppe, Chicken, Beef und...More

review_data.title: Essen gehen
review_data.content: Jedes Gericht das wir bis jetzt hatten sehr lecker und authentisch. Service ist schnell und sehr nett!!! Tolles indisches Restaurant.

review_data.title: Not good food
review_data.content: The chicken we had was not fresh. We had both a madras chicken curry and a chicken biryani, and in both cases the chicken was stale and dry. Me and my friend both had stomach problems the next day.

review_data.title: Nope!
review_data.content: I went their with my family as part of a group tour and got served a buffet spread with 4-5 main course options and breads and sides. It was extremely evident that the owner/management had tried to skimp on the costs everywhere. The curries were...More

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: Went there for lunch. Awsm place. A big Buffet 8 dishes for maincourse in 19.5 franks what more could you think of. Will definitely suggest. Awsm services did not have to wait for long.

review_data.title: Never ever again
review_data.content: I have been a regular "lunch" customer for almost a year. After today's experience, I never ever have lunch at this place. Food (especially chicken) tasted "strange" and spoiled, with the result that I got sick while at the office. You lost a regular customer.

review_data.title: Average, nothing more
review_data.content: Visited Sawad for lunch and found it just about average. Price was expected according to Zurich standards about the quality of dishes and service was just mediocre.

review_data.title: Super Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis
review_data.content: Wer ohne lange Wartezeiten vielfältige (das Angebot wechselt mehrmals wöchentlich) und relativ hochwertige indische Speisen zur Mittagszeit mitnehmen möchte, ist...More

review_data.title: GOOD PLACE TO EAT
review_data.content: We had dinner on 28&29 JUNE 2018. Ambience is good. Locations is also good. They have open space also for dining. Dish Rates are little high but Zurich is like that only. Enjoyable dinner.

review_data.title: Average buffet
review_data.content: Thought I would try Swaad one lunchtime. Got there just before 13.00 and decided to try the buffet. Got off to a bad start when I saw that the popadoms had all gone, when I asked for some, I was told they were finished. Some...More

review_data.title: Super and delicious
review_data.content: nice indian food, all you can eat buffet for lunch so you can go with a lot of appetite! salads, naan and different indian food.

review_data.title: Good place
review_data.content: Not crowded and delicious food. Misunderstood some of the order. All in all a good place. I recommend this place to Indian food lovers.

review_data.title: In this restaurant a boss himself decides if you tip or not
review_data.content: I must say that the food is good although nothing special. When I was paying (cash) the boss himself charged me 1 franc more. It´s not about the money here. He just took for granted that I was giving him a tip. I usually like...More

review_data.title: A great Indian restaurant in Zurich

review_data.title: Very good food with some room for improvement in service

review_data.title: Indian buffet at reasonable price

review_data.title: Take-away box is too small. Ambience is mediocre.
review_data.content: The lunch buffet is not expensive (currently less than CHF20). But you won't be imspired by the ambience. It seems to be a canteen. The take-away is less than CHF15. But the take-away box is too small to put food enough.

review_data.title: Cheap and fast Indian lunch buffet

review_data.title: Average indian food
review_data.content: Have been twice here, and both time it was good. Nothing more, nothing less. Not fancy, not traditional, weird ambiance. But you always find a table without reservation, as it is not in the centre of the city, which is a plus. Disapointing was, that...More

review_data.title: good indian food.

review_data.title: Tasty, well-prepared Indian/Thai buffet at a great price
review_data.content: Even 2 years after its metamorphosis into an Indian/Thai buffet at lunchtime, Swaad continues to offer tasty, well-prepared food at a great price. There are at least 5 or 6 main dishes to sample, plus a starter buffet, rice, naan and papadom. We have been...More

review_data.title: There is no zero rating on tripadvisor

review_data.title: Good Value Lunch Buffet
